data.title: SunGard Acquires Aceva Technologies
data.meta_description: SunGard said today that it has acquired Aceva Technologies, a provider of receivables management software. Financial terms were not disclosed. Aceva will become part of SunGard's Calabasas-based AvantGard business unit, and marketed under the AvantGa
data.text: SunGard said today that it has acquired Aceva Technologies, a provider of receivables management software. Financial terms were not disclosed. Aceva will become part of SunGard's Calabasas-based AvantGard business unit, and marketed under the AvantGard Receivables brand. Aceva Technologies is venture backed by Accel Partners, Sequoia Capital, and Clearstone Ventures.
